messages.title: Dear Resident,
messages.content: The Conservatives are aiming for a landslide majority. Cities of London & Westminster, will not decide the government; so why not get an MP who will work for you? The incumbent MP has little time for the constituency; I want to be a strong voice for local people in Parliament.

messages.title: Delivering for Cities of London & Westminster
messages.content: I am a proven community and business leader with endless energy. I will be an active MP, listening to your needs, regardless of your political persuasion, making an impact in Parliament.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: I will have a fully staffed office in the constituency, with regular surgeries.
I will be a champion for local communities and small businesses.
I will fight against a hard Brexit and push to get the best deal possible.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Speaking up on the NHS, schools and housing
keyPolicies.policyDescription: I will fight against cuts to schools, the NHS, and social housing.
I will work with the Mayor, Sadiq Khan, to clean up our city's air.

mentions.tacticalSituation: The Conservatives think they will win by a landslide. Vote that will really work for you. New MP who is a hard worker.

issues.brexitEurope: Fighting Brexit. I will fight against a hard Brexit and push to get the best deal possible.
issues.education: Speaking up on the NHS, schools and housing. I will fight against cuts to schools, the NHS, and social housing.
issues.environment: Cleaning up our air. I will work with the Mayor, Sadiq Khan, to clean up our city's air.
issues.health: Speaking up on the NHS, schools and housing. I will fight against cuts to schools, the NHS, and social housing.

housing.content: Speaking up on the NHS, schools and housing. I will fight against cuts to schools, the NHS, and social housing.

leaflet.personalStatement: I have proven myself as a tireless community and business leader, and am a real self-made man. If elected, I will throw my endless energy into standing up for you. I will hold regular surgeries and be an accountable, accessible and hard-working MP.

contactInformation.address: 4th Floor, Willow House, Barbican, London EC2Y 8NX

endorsements.endorsement: I'm supporting Ibrahim because he tackles everything on our city: issue of asylum seekers who has built a successful business while working to heal community divisions. Head and Heart.
Ibrahim Dogus is a passionate man. Passionate about our NHS, our city, our country, our future. He deserves our support and we deserve a Labour MP like Ibrahim Dogus.
Ibrahim has a proven record of standing up for local communities and small businesses. Active, enthusiastic and dynamic, Ibrahim will do our constituency proud as a candidate and our MP.

images.caption: Elect Ibrahim Dogus Labour candidate for Cities of London & Westminster Vote Labour Thursday 8 June
